name: Redbeard's Return
description:
Sea be a harsh mistress. One moment, ye have it all – loot, treasures, rum… Then ye anger one little monster, and ye have nothing.

In this adventure game, you need to traverse the hostile seas, overcome obstacles and find your way back to pirate glory. Yarrrrrr!

This game was made for Ludum Dare 45 with the theme "Start with nothing."

Controls
  • WSAD or ↑↓← → to move
  • E to interact
  • SPACE to attack
Tools

Made with Godot 3.1 engine..
